analyzed: asataḥ sarva maya tva ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ na akāraṇe iti akāraṇe na vidyate kāraṇam yasya

original: tādṛśe / ādikāraṇe pare utkṛṣṭe cinmātre / kāraṇādi na asti / ādikāraṇatvāpāyād iti
analyzed: tādṛśe ādikāraṇe pare utkṛṣṭe cit mātre kāraṇa ādi na asti ādikāraṇa tva apāyāt iti

analyzed: bhāvaḥ

analyzed: bījam jahat nija vapuḥ phalībhūtam vilokyate  brahmā ajahat nija vapuḥ phalam bījam ca saṃsthitam

original: bījasyākṛtimat sarvaṃ tenānākṛti tatpadam / na yujyate samīkartuṃ tasmān nāsty upamā śive //MU_4,18.24//
analyzed: bījasya ākṛtimat sarvam tena anākṛti tat padam  na yujyate samīkartum tasmāt nā asti upamā śive

analyzed: sarvam samastam svarūpam  bījasya ākṛtimat bhavati tena tatas hetoḥ śive śuddha cit mātra tattve upamā na asti

analyzed: kham eva jāyate kha ābhāt na ca tat jāyate atas na jātam vā jātam viddhi brahma nabhaḥ jagat

original: ity āha / na ceti / caśabdo hetau / yataḥ tat jagannāma kham / anyadṛk brahmetaradṛgrūpam /
analyzed: iti āha na ca iti  caśabdaḥ hetau yatas tat jagat nāma kham anyadṛś brahma itara dṛś rūpam

original: na jāyate notpadyate / phalitaṃ kathayati ata iti / ataḥ paramārthato / na jātam /

original: ābhāsataḥ jātaṃ vā / jagat brahmanabhaḥ brahmākāśam / viddhi //MT_4,18.25 //
analyzed: ābhāsataḥ jātam vā jagat brahma nabhaḥ brahma ākāśam viddhi

original: dṛśyam paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā samprapaśyati / prapañcākrāntasaṃvitteḥ kasyodeti nijā sthitiḥ //MU_4,18.26//
analyzed: dṛśyam paśyan svam ātmānam na draṣṭā samprapaśyati prapañca ākrānta saṃvitteḥ kasya udeti nijā sthitiḥ

analyzed: nijam ātmānam na paśyati na anubhavati prapañcena ākrāntā sva unmukha tām nītā saṃvittiḥ

analyzed: yasya tādṛśasya kasya puruṣasya nijā sthitiḥ svam svarūpam udeti sphurati

original: na kasyāpīty arthaḥ //MT_4,18.26 //

analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇā jala bhrāntau satyām kā iva vidagdha tā  vidagdha tāyām satyām tu kā iva asau mṛgatṛṣṇikā

original: ākāśaviśadam brahma yatnenāpi na labhyate / dṛśye dṛśyatayādṛṣṭe tv asya lābhaḥ sudūrataḥ //MU_4,18.29//

analyzed: sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svam paśyasi anayā tathā jagat jāla sahasrāṇi paramāṇu antareṣu api

analyzed: sā cit tena śuddha tvena

original: na jagannāma kiñcid aparaṃ vastu asti / cidāśrayaviṣayasya svātmaparāmarśasyaiva
analyzed: na jagat nāma kiñcid aparam vastu asti cit āśraya viṣayasya sva ātma parāmarśasya eva

original: jagattvād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_4,33.21 //
analyzed: jagat tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi katham bheda iva dṛśyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api katham bhedaḥ iva dṛśyate iti atra āha

original: trailokyarūpo ḥnubhavaś cidādityāṃśumaṇḍalam / kva vendvaṃśumator bhedo nirvikatthana kathyatām //MU_4,33.22//
analyzed: trailokya rūpaḥ cit āditya aṃśu maṇḍalam kva vā indu aṃśumatoḥ bhedaḥ nirvikatthana kathyatām

original: trailokyarūpaḥ trailokyākāraḥ / anubhavaḥ / trailokyam iti yāvat / cid evādityaḥ /
analyzed: trailokya rūpaḥ trailokya ākāraḥ anubhavaḥ trailokyam iti yāvat cit eva ādityaḥ

original: tasyāṃśumaṇḍalam / bhavati / he nirvikatthana he amṛṣāvādin / tvayā kathyatām / kim
analyzed: tasya aṃśu maṇḍalam bhavati he nirvikatthana he amṛṣāvādin tvayā kathyatām kim

original: ity apekṣāyām āha / kveti / indvaṃśumatoḥ jalamaṇḍalapratibimbitasūryāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya
analyzed: iti apekṣāyām āha kva iti indu aṃśumatoḥ jala maṇḍala pratibimbita sūrya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya

original: indoḥ sūryasya ca / bhedaḥ kva bhavati / kasmin kāle deśe vā bhavati / yathā jalapratibimbitasūryāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya
analyzed: indoḥ sūryasya ca bhedaḥ kva bhavati kasmin kāle deśe vā bhavati yathā jala pratibimbita sūrya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya

original: candrasya sūryasya ca bhāsamāno ḥpi bhedaḥ paramārthataḥ nāsti / tathā bāhyāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbitacidādityāṃśumaṇḍalarūpasya
analyzed: candrasya sūryasya ca bhāsamānaḥ bhedaḥ paramārthataḥ na asti tathā bāhya antaḥkaraṇa pratibimbita cit āditya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya

original: jagataḥ cidādityasya ca bhāsamāno ḥpi bhedaḥ nāsty evety arthaḥ //MT_4,33.22 //
analyzed: jagataḥ cit ādityasya ca bhāsamānaḥ u ḥpi bhedaḥ na asti eva iti arthaḥ

original: sarvathā bhedābhāvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: sarvathā bheda abhāvam kathayati

original: svabhāvato ḥsyāś ciddṛṣṭer ye unmeṣanimeṣaṇe / jagadrūpānubhūtes tāv etāv astamayodayau //MU_4,33.23//
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ cit dṛṣṭeḥ ye unmeṣa nimeṣaṇe jagat rūpa anubhūteḥ tau etau astamaya udayau

original: svabhāvataḥ yatnarahitam / asyāḥ ātmatvena puraḥsthāyāḥ / ciddṛṣṭeḥ cidākhyāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ yatna rahitam asyāḥ ātma tvena puraḥsthāyāḥ cit dṛṣṭeḥ cit ākhyāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ

original: ye unmeṣaṇanimeṣaṇe svavyatiriktaparāmarśarūpam unmeṣaṇaṃ svamātraparāmarśarūpaṃ
analyzed: ye unmeṣaṇa nimeṣaṇe sva vyatirikta parāmarśa rūpam unmeṣaṇam sva mātra parāmarśa rūpam

original: nimeṣaṇaṃ ca bhavataḥ / tau eva unmeṣanimeṣau eva / jagadrūpā yā anubhūtiḥ / jagad
analyzed: nimeṣaṇam ca bhavataḥ tau eva unmeṣa nimeṣau eva jagat rūpā yā anubhūtiḥ jagat

original: iti yāvat / tasyāḥ astamayodayau bhavataḥ / nimeṣaṇam astamayaḥ / unmeṣaṇam udayaḥ /
analyzed: iti yāvat tasyāḥ astamaya udayau bhavataḥ nimeṣaṇam astamayaḥ unmeṣaṇam udayaḥ

original: atha vā unmeṣaṇam svarūpaprasāraḥ / nimeṣaṇam svarūpasaṅkocaḥ / iti kṛtvā unmeṣaṇam
analyzed: atha vā unmeṣaṇam svarūpa prasāraḥ nimeṣaṇam svarūpa saṅkocaḥ iti kṛtvā unmeṣaṇam

original: astamayaḥ / nimeṣaṇam udaya iti yojyam / tathā ca bhedagandho ḥpi nāsti / na hi unmeṣanimeṣavataḥ
analyzed: astamayaḥ nimeṣaṇam udayaḥ iti yojyam tathā ca bheda gandhaḥ na asti na hi unmeṣa nimeṣavataḥ

original: unmeṣanimeṣau bhinnau iti bhāvaḥ / etac ca svapne suṣuptau ca sarvapratītisākṣikam
analyzed: unmeṣa nimeṣau bhinnau iti bhāvaḥ etat ca svapne suṣuptau ca sarva pratīti sākṣikam

original: eveti nātrāyastam //MT_4,33.23 //
analyzed: eva iti na atra ayastam

original: kāraṇatvena samastajagatpradhānabhūtāhaṅkāravarṇanam prastauti
analyzed: kāraṇa tvena samasta jagat pradhāna bhūta ahaṅkāra varṇanam prastauti

original: ahamartho ḥparijñātaḥ paramārthāmbare malaḥ / parijñāto ḥhamarthas tu paramārthāmbaram bhavet //MU_4,33.24//
analyzed: parama artha ambare malaḥ tu parama artha ambaram bhavet

original: ahamarthaḥ aham iti śabdābhidheyaṃ vastu / aparijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃrūpo ḥyam
analyzed: aham arthaḥ aham iti śabda abhidheyam vastu aparijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃrūpaḥ ḥyam

original: ity ajñātaḥ san / paramārthāmbare cinmātrākāśe / malaḥ bhavati / deharūpatayāvasthānena
analyzed: iti ajñātaḥ san paramārtha ambare cit mātra ākāśe malaḥ bhavati deha rūpa tayā avasthānena

original: tadācchādakatvāt / ācchādakatvam eva hi malasya svarūpam / tu vyatireke / parijñātaḥ
analyzed: tad ācchādaka tvāt ācchādaka tvam eva hi malasya svarūpam tu vyatireke parijñātaḥ

original: paramārthataḥ evaṃrūpo ḥsāv iti jñātaḥ san / paramārthāmbaram cinmātrākāśa eva bhavati /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ evaṃrūpaḥ ḥsau iti jñātaḥ san paramārtha ambaram cit mātra ākāśaḥ eva bhavati

original: tadrūpatāyām eva viśrāmāt //MT_4,33.24 //
analyzed: tad rūpa tāyām eva viśrāmāt

original: abhyāsārtham punaḥ punaḥ etad eva kathayati
analyzed: abhyāsa artham punar punar etat eva kathayati

original: ahambhāvaḥ parijñāto nāhambhāve bhavaty alam / ekatām ambunevāmbu yāti cinnabhasātmanā //MU_4,33.25//
analyzed: ahambhāvaḥ parijñātaḥ na ahambhāve bhavati alam eka tām ambunā iva ambu yāti cit nabhasā ātmanā

original: parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho ḥyam iti jñātaḥ / ahambhāvaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ / ahambhāve
analyzed: parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭhaḥ iti jñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ ahambhāve

original: nimittasaptamī / sthūlāhambhāvanimittaṃ na bhavati / kuta etad ity / atrāhaikatām
analyzed: nimitta saptamī sthūla ahambhāva nimittam na bhavati kutas etat iti atra āha ekatām

original: iti / yataḥ saḥ ahambhāvaḥ cinnabhasā cidākāśarūpeṇa / ātmanā ekatāṃ yāti / kim iva /
analyzed: iti yatas saḥ ahambhāvaḥ cit nabhasā cit ākāśa rūpeṇa ātmanā ekatām yāti kim iva

original: ambu iva / yathāmbu ambunā ekatāṃ yāti / tathety arthaḥ / paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho
analyzed: ambu iva yathā ambu ambunā ekatām yāti tathā iti arthaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭhaḥ

original: ḥyam iti ahaṅkāraparamārthasvarūpe jñāte sati ahaṅkāraḥ paramātmaniṣṭho bhavati /
analyzed: iti ahaṅkāra paramārtha svarūpe jñāte sati ahaṅkāraḥ paramātma niṣṭhaḥ bhavati

original: tataḥ śarīraniṣṭhatārūpām parimitatāṃ nāyātīti bhāvaḥ //MT_4,33.25 //
analyzed: tatas śarīra niṣṭha tā rūpām parimita tām na āyāti iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu katham parijñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ cidātmanā ekatvaṃ yāti ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham parijñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ cit ātmanā ekatvam yāti iti atra āha

original: ahamādijagaddṛśyaṃ kila nāsty eva vastutaḥ / avaśyam eva tat kasmāc chiṣyate ḥhaṃvicāriṇaḥ //MU_4,33.26//
analyzed: aham ādi jagat dṛśyam kila nā asti eva vastutas avaśyam eva tat kasmāt śiṣyate ḥhaṃvicāriṇaḥ

original: kila niścaye / ahamādi
analyzed: kila niścaye ahamādi
